title: 2013 Ride Buckwild Snowboard Review By Skis.com

asset.author: skisdotcom
asset.hookText: http://www.skis.com/Ride-Buckwild-Snowboard-2013/280961P,default,pd.html?dwvar_280961P_SwatchValue=155cm  Make sure you are strapped in tight. The Ride Buckwild is an untamed beast with hook free feel. This is the go to competition deck for much of the Ride team, whether you are boosting out of the pipe, running laps through the park or just slashing turns the Buckwild is one wild ride. This board has the LowRize rocker shape so it has minimal rocker shape with a long stable flat zone that extends beyond the inserts into the tip and the tail. The Pop Rods 2.0 core supplies major pop and super solid landings. Combine that with Slimewalls and Cleave Edge and you have a smooth riding durable deck built to lap the park like the pros.
